reviews.snippet:
I was aware about this shop from one of Japan content creator in his social media and was excited to try it myself.
And by the time i got the change to try it, it hits me right on the spot.

The food is indeed delicious, the broth is rich with flavour,  the meat is well cooked and tender, the ramen noodle is chewy.
For spicy food lover, can add separate chilli powder.
And definetely no worry feeling due to the halal certified foods there.

The place is neat, clean and comfortable to grab ramen with family or friends.
Praying room is available, definitely very useful for traveler looking for place to pray in Shinjuku area.

We definetely will go back there if we ever get the change to visit Japan again insya Allah.

Thank you

Ramen was smooth and tasty, and the chicken broth felt legit. Definitely worth a try!
